abilities.name: Gyro Unit
abilities.effect: Your Basic Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Turbo Drive
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rebel-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
